dict.string: On Block Island, visitors can see Settlers’ Rock, which is inscribed with the names of the first inhabitants.
The Narragansett Pacer is the first American-bred horse that contributed to local prosperity in the Colonial era.
When Anne Hutchinson was kicked out of the colony for her beliefs about women’s rights, she settled on Aquineck Island.
Rhode Island's economy is built upon three industries: health services, tourism and manufacturing.
Lime Rock Preserve features dolomitic marble which produce a special soil that nurtures rare plant species.
The Newport Casino, which is actually a country club, hosts the only grass-court tennis tournament in the U.S.
